articles.content: Elon Musks car is making its way across the solar system. The firm behind the endeavour, SpaceX, shared an image on Saturday showing how the Starman in Musks cherry red Roadster, launched on a Falcon Heavy in February, has made its way beyond Mars and is set … [+1802 chars]
